name: svelte-shared-transition
description: Transition elements between routes in Svelte apps.
readme:
# svelte-shared-transition Transition shared elements between routes easily. ## Install ```bash yarn add svelte-shared-transition ``` ## Usage ```javascript import SharedTransition from "svelte-shared-transition"; ``` ```html
``` Transition starts once the components is mounted. ## Props | name | type | default | description | | -------- | ------- | ----------- | --------------------------------------------------- | | key | string | | the key shared by the elements to be transitioned. | | easing | string | ease-in-out | | | delay | number | 0.0 | | | duration | number | 250 | | | clear | boolean | false | clear animation properties when done transitioning. | ## Methods - play - pause - update [Demo](https://github.com/JoshuaAmaju/svelte-shared-transition)
